revised_title: A Description of Fullers-Earth Pits in Bedfordshire
tldr: The author describes the layers and composition of Fullers-Earth pits in Bedfordshire. He explains the different layers of sand, sandstone, and Fullers-Earth, as well as the mining techniques used to extract the earth. The author also discusses the geographical location of these pits and speculates that similar deposits of Fullers-Earth may be found in other parts of the same ridge of sand hills.
